short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to help the user instantly recognize in which crystallize environment he is currently working in by coloring the sidebar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rev up your browsing with an extension that adds a pop of color to Crystallize! Instantly spot your current workspace in style as our sidebar transformation takes the guesswork out of which environment you're working in.
